title: Shaun Toub
summary: Shaun Toub (Persian: شان توب; ; born February 15, 1958)  is an Iranian-born American actor. He has played the character Yinsen in Iron Man (2008) and Iron Man 3 (2013); Farhad in Crash (2004); Rahim Khan in The Kite Runner (2007); Majid Javadi in the Showtime television series Homeland; and Faraz Kamali in the Apple TV+ Israeli series Tehran (2020).
